Name Rascal/Libraries/Graph/reachX

Synopsis Determine the graph nodes reachable from a set of nodes excluding certain intermediate nodes.
Function set[&T] reachX(Graph[&T] G, set[&T] Start, set[&T] Excl)
Description Returns set of nodes in Graph G that are reachable from any of the nodes in Start via path that exclude nodes in Excl.
Examples 
rascal>import Graph;
ok
rascal>reachX({<1,2>, <1,3>, <2,4>, <3,4>}, {1}, {2});
set[int]: {4,3}
